trends: There have been 126 other sightings in Indianapolis
There was one other sighting in Indianapolis on or around July 24th 2008
Summary: Bright Red lights turning on and off then sperating over Marion County
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside in my front yard looking North, when I saw what looked like an aiplane landing lights, but it was odd because the jets do not usually approch from that direction. The light was a circle, with a red and white cast to it. I did not pay much attention to it untill I noticed that it flickerd off then on again brighter. Then few seconds later a scecond one appeared as the first one flicker off. They were right beside one another. Then one, two and three spehers appeared in a diaganle formation from left to right, the first appeared flickering on, then off, then the second one flickerd on the off, and so on. I really can't explain the way they turned on and off, but to say they flickerd. Then later on they would appear indivually turning on and off. Then I got my bonoculers, to look and the spears appeard very small and red in color and almost diamond shape. One light would sperate into two and then a third one would appear sperate from the other two, that just had sperated. After that I stayed outside for approx 1 hour after I saw the last one and they never appeared again. I got a compass to see what direction I was looking and it was right on North then I log the time. Just has a side note, I saw these lights last year at the approx time, date and location in the sky. If someone would like to contact me I can give a better explanation
